title: You Have No Idea
lyrics:
All through the day
I'm seein' your face on replay
Like a movie in my mind
'Till barely even I see my real life
And all through the night time
Lie [?] the last time

Thinkin' 'bout the night you stayed here

[?]

Now you're making me laugh

When you say you wonder

How I feel about you



You have no idea

How many times I think about you

How many nights of been waiting to love you

How much of come to need you

Come to meet

You have no idea

How many ways I dream about you

How many days of been waiting to touch you

Now that I've come to know you

Come to know you

... have no idea



Why can't I hold you

Why can't I be the one who

Who you wake and do you lie with

Who you laugh and you dry your eyes with

[?]

And I'm shaking my head

When you say you don't know

If I really want you



You have no idea

How many times I think about you

How many nights of been waiting to love you

How much of come to need you

Come to need you

You have no idea

How many ways I dream about you

How many days of been waiting to touch you

Now that I've come to know you

Come to know...



Now you want to know how I'm sure that you were just what I'm looking for

That we should go out together more

Cause you still make me laugh aloud

When you say you wonder how I feel about you



You have no idea

How many times I think about you

How many nights of been waiting to love you

How much of come to need you

Come to need

You have no idea

How many times I think about you

How many nights of been waiting to love you

How much of come to need you

Come to need you

You have no idea

How many ways I dream about you

How many days of been waiting to touch you

Now that I've come to meet you

Come to meet

Now that I've come to need you



You have no idea



You have no idea
